description: Welcome to 'Wilder Crossing' built by Infinity Properties, a premier builder in The Fraser Valley! This end unit 3 bed 3 bath boasts upgrades like shiplap feature walls and ceilings, built-ins, air-conditioning, and EV parking, plus epoxy floors in the double garage. But the best part is undoubtedly the big back yard, which can be accessed directly from the kitchen and dining area and features a natural gas barbecue hookup, and views of greenbelt and gorgeous trees and flower beds that brim with magnolia blooms in the spring and hydrangeas in the summer! Brand new furnace, freshly painted top to bottom, close to Hwy one for commuters and in the coveted RE Mountain school catchment popular for its IB program, this is the one you've been waiting for. Home is where your Storey begins!
